Member Function Documentation

int ParserCWHandler::getURL (  const MC2String &  urlStr,
const MC2String &  postData,
uint32  peerIP,
uint32  fromByte,
uint32  toByte,
LangTypes::language_t  clientLang,
const HttpHeader *  inHeaders,
HttpHeader &  outHeaders,
MC2String &  reply,
uint32 &  startByte,
uint32 &  endByte
) 
 

Get an URL.

On error sets an error reply.

Parameters:
urlStr The URL to get.
postData The post data if any.
peerIP The client's IP address.
fromByte The index of the first byte to get.
toByte The index of the last byte to get.
clientLang The language to get.
inHeaders The client http headers if any, may be NULL.
outHeaders Set to the reply headers.
reply Set to the reply body.
startByte Set to the index of first byte in the reply.
endByte Set to the index of last byte in the reply.
Returns:
The URLFetcher returncode.

LangTypes::language_t  clientLang
)  const
